title: Tempo-Motion
summary: Start your journey to get fit today with Tempo-Motion and get rewards as you go.
description: Tempo-motion is a Fitness app that help you get fit using data and reward you when you do so.-Using your Android wear devices or mobile phones,your fitness data will be visualized in a simple view within your touch,ready when you want ,where you want it to be.- More importantly, We really reward you with gift cards credits toward your next purchase of a great movie at AMC, dinner at AppleBee , shopping experience at WholeFood and More to come. - Make every steps counted toward a reward,a giftcard  but more importantly a better YOU#GetFitGetReward #MakeEveryStepCountCompatible with : LG GWatch, Samsung Gear Live, Moto360, LG Gwatch R, Asus Zen Watch.Get start today @ http://tempo-motion.com/Contact : Tempo-Motion LLC 1101 Bellcrest Dr, Arlington, Texas 76002info@tempo-motion.comConnect with us :FaceBook : https://www.facebook.com/tempomotionTwitter : https://twitter.com/tempomotionGoogle Plus : https://plus.google.com/u/0/114108277965916531195/posts
descriptionHTML:
Tempo-motion is a Fitness app that help you get fit using data and reward you when you do so.
-Using your Android wear devices or mobile phones,your fitness data will be visualized in a simple view within your touch,ready when you want ,where you want it to be.
- More importantly, We really reward you with gift cards credits toward your next purchase of a great movie at AMC, dinner at AppleBee , shopping experience at WholeFood and More to come.
- Make every steps counted toward a reward,a giftcard but more importantly a better YOU
#GetFitGetReward #MakeEveryStepCount
Compatible with : LG GWatch, Samsung Gear Live, Moto360, LG Gwatch R, Asus Zen Watch.
Get start today @ http://tempo-motion.com/
Contact :
Tempo-Motion LLC
1101 Bellcrest Dr, Arlington, Texas 76002
info@tempo-motion.com
Connect with us :
FaceBook : https://www.facebook.com/tempomotion
Twitter : https://twitter.com/tempomotion
Google Plus : https://plus.google.com/u/0/114108277965916531195/posts
comments: Awesome app! I love how easy it is to sync my app from my phone. It is even more awesome that I can earn gift cards while I get healthy! I think it is a great way to get people to have a healthier lifestyle and who doesn't love free gift cards? The app is super easy to use and I'm glad I found it :)

Makes getting fit easy! I love this app because it makes it so easy to track all of the data from my Android Wear watch so I can stay on track with my fitness goals. Being able to earn gift cards to movie theaters and restaurants is just a bonus!

Awesome concept fun way to work out! Really enjoy this app, because it's a different way to give myself motivation to workout. The way I can work out an receive gift credit that I can track right from my Android device is amazing!
It kept telling me I had no internet. I tried turning off my wifi and that didn't work either. Uninstalling.
Easy to use At the moment i dont have android wear, but this app have function use android mobile sensor. That help a lot to track my workout
Great app The idea of having an app where you can be assisted in your fitness endeavors and receive bonuses for it is extra motivation for me to work out. Great concept!!!!
recentChanges: - Workout program to help users choose from different activities and keep track on those
- Get summary with your workout adata
